post_title: $OLD- (2nd reduction lets move these ) 20 Lot of Portraits, 18 psa, 2 bvg.
post_content:

Harry Arndt P350 - PSA 2
Jake Atz P350 - BVG 3

Doc Casey P350 - PSA 2
Lou Criger SC 150/30 - PSA 1

Thanks for looking, Bob I.
